Stream.of(
Block.box(-3, 16, -1.7000000000000028, 19, 23, 20.299999999999997),
Block.box(3, 7.678932188134526, 3.3566017177982115, 13, 17.678932188134524, 13.356601717798211),
Block.box(1, 3.7000000000000006, 1.3000000000000003, 15, 7.699999999999999, 15.3)
).reduce((v1, v2) -> VoxelShapes.join(v1, v2, IBooleanFunction.OR)).get();
